snippet: Bernark Kreh, better known as Lefty, is a writer, photographer and television personality who helped popularize saltwater fly-fishing.
lead_paragraph: Bernark Kreh, better known as Lefty, is a writer, photographer and television personality who helped popularize saltwater fly-fishing.

headline.seo: Lefty Kreh Remains Ambassador for Fly-Fishing at 87
headline.main: Lesson in Timelessness by a Fly-Fishing Master
headline.print_headline: Lesson in Timelessness By a Fly-Fishing Master
